attributes.action: During PMQs in the House of Commons, the Prime Minister should answer questions.
attributes.background:
Numerous instances can be found where, instead of addressing questions put to him, the Prime Minister resorts to shabby rhetoric and jibes intended to distract from the matter at hand.
This is not the purpose of Prime Minister's Questions. There are better places to watch a Punch and Judy Show.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Parliament and Government. For example, your petition doesn't specify who should decide whether the Prime Minister has or has not answered the question. 

You might be interested in signing the following petition which is similar to your petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/118388
